description: DeKalb County police say they’ve found a man accused of sexual battery against a Little Caesars employee while he was robbing the restaurant.
title: DeKalb cops say they got the Little Caesars sexual battery suspect
title_page: DeKalb cops say they got the little Caesars sexual battery suspect
text:
DeKalb County police say they’ve found a man accused of sexual battery against a Little Caesars employee while he was robbing the restaurant.
The department announced Jerome Paige’s arrest on Twitter on Thursday morning. The 47-year-old Decatur-area man was in jail on $1,500 bond.
A day earlier police released security camera footage of the crimes, along with a sketch of the suspect. Police said the man robbed the restaurant at 1944 Candler Road outside Decatur on March 11.
It happened at about 12:30 a.m.
